thread.title: 'Criminal Minds' Season 11 Spoilers: The BAU Team Will Go to Detroit in Episode 5 and A. J. Cook Will Return from Maternity Leave in Episode 7
thread.title_full: 'Criminal Minds' Season 11 Spoilers: The BAU Team Will Go to Detroit in Episode 5 and A. J. Cook Will Return from Maternity Leave in Episode 7

title: 'Criminal Minds' Season 11 Spoilers: The BAU Team Will Go to Detroit in Episode 5 and A. J. Cook Will Return from Maternity Leave in Episode 7
text:
'Criminal Minds' Season 11 Spoilers: The BAU Team Will Go to Detroit in Episode 5 and A. J. Cook Will Return from Maternity Leave in Episode 7 0 By Paula Dela Cruz , Christian Post Contributor October 23, 2015 | 2:06 am CBS Official Website Aisha Tyler as Dr. Tara Lewis 
Fans of the hit CBS crime drama "Criminal Minds" will now see the team going back to Detroit, Michigan to investigate yet another series of murders. The last time the team went to Detroit was in s eason 8 episode 22 , which is entitled "#6," where a killer murdered a couple and placed them in their cars. 
In the upcoming episode of the show, which is entitled "The Night Watch,"' viewers will see an "unsub" (unknown subject), who is morbidly killing his victims and putting the murders into street arts. A synopsis of the episode was posted on TV Guide , and it said that the FBI's BAU team is in Detroit to find out who is the street artist that is behind the "killer" graffiti. The team was able to find a suspect for the crime, however, this street artist is known to have always been able to escape the authorities. 
Meanwhile, the summary also added Dr. Tara Lewis (Aisha Tyler) will find it difficult to balance her work and her personal life. A few episodes back, Tara was seen dismissing the call of her fiancé, Douglas Fuller, while at work, and Derek Morgan (Shemar Moore) called her for it. Fans are curious what else will the team's newest member will reveal about her in episode 5. 
The full summary reads, "The BAU investigates when victims' bodies are incorporated into macabre graffiti art in Detroit. The team suspects that a notorious street artist is responsible. Meanwhile, Dr. Lewis struggles to balance her relationship with her fiancé and her work." 
In other news, A. J. Cook confirmed her return to the show in the upcoming seventh episode, which is entitled " Target Rich, " on her Instagram account. "To all those concerned: Don't worry! I'll be back on #criminalminds episode 7. Thank you for missing me and thank you for understanding that I need #mommytime," she captioned on her photo with her newborn son. 
Watch new episodes of "Criminal Minds" every Wednesday on CBS.
